name: Fire Power (itch)
description:
Game prototype for the 8 Bits to Infinity ~ Two Button Jam.

Game:
Members of the Mining Corps in sector 4 have been taken hostage. Evacuate as many of them as you can!

Pilot: Captain, our fuel tanks have been hit!
Captain: Fly on Fire Power!

Instructions:
- if you land too fast (> 30), or too steep, you'll crash
- careful not to shoot or crush the miners while landing
- choose your weapons wisely

Controls:
Keyboard: 
SPACE - Select & Fire
UP Arrow - Rotate spacecraft (pressing repeatedly alternates direction)

Controller:
X - Select & Fire
D-PAD UP - Rotate spacecraft (pressing repeatedly alternates direction)
